open_resources_directory.toolTip: Opens a file browser at the location Krita saves resources such as brushes to.

gamutCheck.toolTip: Turns on warnings for colors out of proofed gamut, needs soft proofing to be turned on. (Ctrl+Shift+Y)

showStatusBar.toolTip: Show or hide the status bar

view_show_canvas_only.toolTip: Show just the canvas or the whole window (Tab)

ruler_pixel_multiple2.toolTip: Use multiple of 2 for pixel scale

reset_display.toolTip: Reset zoom, rotation, and mirroring to their default states.

view_print_size.toolTip: Map the canvas display to print size, based on the image resolution.

reset_fg_bg.toolTip: Set foreground and background colors to black and white (D)

toggle_brush_outline.toolTip: Disable the brush outline, or enable the previously used brush outline shape if already disabled

filter_apply_reprompt.toolTip: Reapply Last Used Filter with Prompt for Configuration

convert_group_to_animated.toolTip: Convert child layers into animation frames

copy_layer_style.toolTip: Copy Layer Style from the Current Node

paste_layer_style.toolTip: Paste Layer Style into the Current Node

create_quick_group.toolTip: Create a group layer containing selected layers (Ctrl+G)

create_quick_clipping_group.toolTip: Group selected layers and add a layer with clipped alpha channel (Ctrl+Shift+G)

quick_ungroup.toolTip: Remove grouping of the layers or remove one layer out of the group (Ctrl+Alt+G)

pin_to_timeline.toolTip: If checked, layer becomes pinned to the timeline, making it visible even when inactive.

convert_to_file_layer.toolTip: Saves out the layers into a new image and then references that image.

image_color.toolTip: Change the background color of the image

scaleAllLayers.toolTip: Scale All Layers to new Size

buginfo.toolTip: Show Krita log for bug reports.

sysinfo.toolTip: Show system information for bug reports.

crashlog.toolTip: Show crash log for bug reports.

QMicAgain.toolTip: Apply the last G'Mic-Qt action again

rotateAllLayersCW90.toolTip: Rotate All Layers 90° to the Right

rotateAllLayersCCW90.toolTip: Rotate All Layers 90° to the Left

sample_screen_color.toolTip: Sample a color from the screen

sample_screen_color_real_canvas.toolTip: Sample a color from the screen while sampling a real color from the canvas if the cursor is over it

KritaShape/KisToolMeasure.toolTip: Measure the distance between two points

object_distribute_horizontal_gaps.toolTip: Make horizontal gaps between objects equal

object_distribute_vertical_gaps.toolTip: Make vertical gaps between objects equal

object_unite.toolTip: Create boolean union of multiple objects

object_intersect.toolTip: Create boolean intersection of multiple objects

object_subtract.toolTip: Subtract multiple objects from the first selected one

object_split.toolTip: Split objects with multiple subpaths into multiple objects

KisToolPolygon.toolTip: Polygon Tool. Shift-mouseclick ends the polygon.

KritaFill/KisToolFill.toolTip: Fill a contiguous area of color with a color, or fill a selection. (F)

KisToolTransform.toolTip: Transform a layer or a selection (Ctrl+T)

KritaSelected/KisToolColorSampler.toolTip: Sample a color from the image or current layer (P)

KisToolPath.toolTip: Bezier Curve Tool. Shift-mouseclick or double-click ends the curve.

KisToolCrop.toolTip: Crop the image to an area (C)

movetool-show-coordinates.toolTip: Show absolute coordinates and offset while move action (Ctrl+Alt+Shift+C)

KisToolPolyline.toolTip: Polyline Tool. Shift-mouseclick ends the polyline.

add_scalar_keyframes.toolTip: Adds keyframe to control scalar property

zoom_to_fit_range.toolTip: Zoom view to fit channel range.

drop_frames.toolTip: Drop Frames, enable to preserve playback timing.

show-global-selection-mask.toolTip: Shows global selection as a usual selection mask in <interface>Layers</interface> docker

set-copy-from.toolTip: Set the source for the selected clone layer(s).

toggle_layer_soloing.toolTip: Toggle layer soloing, temporarily disabling visibility of all non-child layers.

insert_column_left.toolTip: Insert column to the left of selection, moving the tail of animation to the right

insert_column_right.toolTip: Insert column to the right of selection, moving the tail of animation to the right

insert_multiple_columns.toolTip: Insert several columns based on user parameters.

remove_columns_and_pull.toolTip: Remove columns moving the tail of animation to the left

remove_columns.toolTip: Remove columns without moving anything around

insert_hold_column.toolTip: Insert a hold column into the frame at the current position

insert_multiple_hold_columns.toolTip: Insert N hold columns into the frame at the current position

remove_hold_column.toolTip: Remove a hold column from the frame at the current position

remove_multiple_hold_columns.toolTip: Remove N hold columns from the frame at the current position

clear_animation_cache.toolTip: Clear entire animation cache. Useful for debugging.

insert_keyframe_left.toolTip: Insert keyframes to the left of selection, moving the tail of animation to the right.

insert_keyframe_right.toolTip: Insert keyframes to the right of selection, moving the tail of animation to the right.

insert_multiple_keyframes.toolTip: Insert several keyframes based on user parameters.

remove_frames_and_pull.toolTip: Remove keyframes moving the tail of animation to the left

remove_frames.toolTip: Remove keyframes without moving anything around

insert_hold_frame.toolTip: Insert a hold frame after every keyframe

insert_multiple_hold_frames.toolTip: Insert N hold frames after every keyframe

remove_hold_frame.toolTip: Remove a hold frame after every keyframe

remove_multiple_hold_frames.toolTip: Remove N hold frames after every keyframe

make_clones_unique.toolTip: Convert clones to unique keyframe instances.

previous_matching_keyframe.toolTip: Change time to previous keyframe of the same color

next_matching_keyframe.toolTip: Change time to next keyframe of the same color

previous_unfiltered_keyframe.toolTip: Change time to previous keyframe that has visible onion skin

next_unfiltered_keyframe.toolTip: Change time to next keyframe that has visible onion skin

wgcs_lighten_color.toolTip: Increase value, lightness, intensity or luma of the selected color, depending on selected color model

wgcs_darken_color.toolTip: Decreases value, lightness, intensity or luma of the selected color, depending on selected color model

wgcs_increase_saturation.toolTip: Increase saturation of the selected color

wgcs_decrease_saturation.toolTip: Decrease saturation of the selected color

wgcs_shift_hue_clockwise.toolTip: Shift hue of the selected color clockwise

wgcs_shift_hue_counterclockwise.toolTip: Shift hue of the selected color counter-clockwise

fullscreen.toolTip: Display the window in full screen (Ctrl+Shift+F)

file_open_recent.toolTip: Open a document which was recently opened

file_save_as.toolTip: Save document under a new name (Ctrl+Shift+S)

render_animation.toolTip: Render Animation to GIF, Image Sequence or Video

file_import_file.toolTip: Open existing Document as Untitled Document

view_detached_canvas.toolTip: Show the canvas on a separate window

command_bar_open.toolTip: Open the command bar to search through actions. (Ctrl+Return)

pykrita_yuuki_krita_helper_trigger_float.toolTip: Opens a file browser at the location Krita saves resources such as brushes to. (`)

PluginDevToolsActionPluginGen.toolTip: Create your own new plugin generator
